articles.title: What is grokking in machine learning?
articles.description: The generalisation of overparameterised neural networks has long piqued the curiosity of the machine learning community.
articles.content: Neural networks achieve perfect generalisation, well past the point of overfitting, in some cases through grokking a pattern in data. In a potential ground breaking study, researchers from OpenAI (Alethea Power, Yuri Burda, Harri Edwards, Igor Babusc... [4905 chars]

articles.title: A guide to explaining feature importance in neural networks using SHAP
articles.description: SHAP values (SHapley Additive exPlanations) is an awesome tool to understand your complex Neural network models and other machine learning models such as Decision trees, Random forest.
articles.content: SHAP values (SHapley Additive exPlanations) is an awesome tool to understand your complex Neural network models and other machine learning models such as Decision trees, Random forests. Basically, it visually shows you which feature is important for ... [5777 chars]

articles.description: The DeepSloth attack technique targets adaptive deep neural networks and is optimized for fast and sensitive operations.

articles.title: Innovative machine learning technique transforms MRI imaging efficiency
articles.description: Using smartly trained neural networks, researchers at TU Graz have succeeded in generating precise real-time images of the beating heart from just a few MRI measurement data. Other MRI applications can also be accelerated using this procedure.
articles.content:

articles.description: Networks of nanoscale resistors that work in a similar way to nerve cells in the body could offer advantages over digital machine learning
